Replace.Text: Lungmen
Lungmen Region
Lungmen's
Lin Y端hsia
Lin, full name Lin Y端hsia, is a Lungmenite. Her occupation remains unclear, and her file remains equally suspect, owing to how little information she provided.
It's time to make an example. They'll see what happens when they break the rules.
Lee

A seemingly lax, disorganized middle-aged man who works as a private investigator, at least nominally. Be it tracking, disguise, negotiation, or deduction, he is a master of all the skillsets in a detective's toolkit. However, the most commonly seen of Lee's talents are tea-making and cooking.
When face to face, the "hero" prevails! Is not invariably true here at all.
Dusk

Dusk, a painter from Yan, awaiting assignment. Following the rather excitable actions of a certain resident of the landship by the name of Nian, Dusk has been held as a guest of Rhodes Island. Her skills with a brush are impressive, particularly when it comes the traditional Yan painting style. She currently resides off an isolated Rhodes Island walkway.
Dreams are like unto life, like into the scroll. One sleeps this sleep, will one sleep for millennia?

Shu, the agricultural master of the Great Yan, the heavenly master of the Tianshi Prefecture. She has been engaged in agricultural research in the northern agricultural base of Yan, Dahuang City, for many years and have achieved rich scientific research results.

Chongyue, the elder brother of landship residents Nian, Dusk, and Ling. He has a close relationship with government organizations such as the Yanese Ministry of War and the Sui Regulator. Previously served as a martial arts instructor at the nomadic city Yumen, a position which he has resigned from.
Ling, resident poet of Shangshu, tied to the Sui Regulator and other governmental organs of Yan.
Nine-Colored Deer, claims to come from a mountain forest in Yan, specific location as yet unascertained.
Miss Swire can use her wisdom to solve many problems. The "wisdom" here includes: command, tactics, combat skills, and Money.

Objects that have been shrouded in dust for a long time. She didn't forget it, but simply couldn't bear to touch its rusty edges again; Perhaps one day, it will once again shine with the fierceness of the past.

Lungmen's political leader.Wise, polite, tough, and a good strategist. Highly respected in political circles.Because the lonely city of Lungmen relies on his unconventional diplomatic and commercial ties, it is currently one of the great powers on the world stage. Its present rapid development is proof of that.
Lin, full name Lin Y端hsia, is a Lungmenite. Her occupation remains unclear, and her file remains equally suspect, owing to how little information she provided.

A seemingly lax, disorganized middle-aged man who works as a private investigator, at least nominally. Be it tracking, disguise, negotiation, or deduction, he is a master of all the skillsets in a detective's toolkit. However, the most commonly seen of Lee's talents are tea-making and cooking.

Dusk, a painter from Yan, awaiting assignment. Following the rather excitable actions of a certain resident of the landship by the name of Nian, Dusk has been held as a guest of Rhodes Island. Her skills with a brush are impressive, particularly when it comes the traditional Yan painting style. She currently resides off an isolated Rhodes Island walkway.

Ch'en (Lungmen)
Illuminating the Exquisite Lights

If in [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route range of your [ICON_Capital] Capital, cities also start with a road to it. [NEWLINE]You're Allowed to adjust one more trait ability after unlocking "{LOC_TECH_INDUSTRIALIZATION_NAME}" and "{LOC_TECH_ELECTRICITY_NAME}".[NEWLINE]All buildings (including wonders) provide cities within 5 tiles of located city with half of their base yields.
Foolproof Plan

If the progress of a Technology or Civic is reached 50% at the end of turns, fulfilling it with [ICON_GOLD] Gold of double amount equal to the lacking [ICON_SCIENCE] Science or [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE]Every time you unlock a Technology or Civic, receive a free Eureka or Inspiration of old eras.
Moment of Respite

All Military Policy and Diplomatic Policy slots are replaced by Economic Policy slots.[NEWLINE]At start of turns, all cities receive a boost of [ICON_SCIENCE] Science, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold based on their populations and num of districts.
Image Over Form

Every {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_MARK_OF_HM_NAME} provides +3% extra boost of [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] Eureka and [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] Inspiration. Districts adjacent to {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_MARK_OF_HM_NAME} receive +1 [ICON_GREATARTIST] Great Artist Point.[NEWLINE]Palace has 6 extra [ICON_GREATWORK_LANDSCAPE] slots for Great Works of Art. Allowed to adjust one more trait ability for every 6 times of activations of [ICON_GREATARTIST] Great Artist
Guard Department

Lungmen's unique district replaces Government Plaza with lower cost. Allow you adjust one more trait ability after built. Provide adjacent districts with Huge adjacency bonuses.[NEWLINE]For every level of buildings built in Guard Department, providing all cities with +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities, and expanding the bonus range of "{LOC_TRAIT_CIVILIZATION_ILLUMINATING_THE_EXQUISITE_LIGHTS_NAME}" by 5 tiles.
Mark of Hui and Ming

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a Mark of Hui and Ming.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Can only have one per city. Provide adjacent districts with a large adjacent bonus. Grant yields based on types of adjacent districts. Units can teleport among {LOC_IMPROVEMENT_MARK_OF_HM_NAME}. Provide [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism equal to 200% of its Culture yield after unlocking "{LOC_CIVIC_NATURAL_HISTORY_NAME}" Civic.
Elegance
Enthusiastic about the comprehensive development of national strength, prefers civilizations that do the same, and dislikes backward civilizations.
Honored Guest
Enthusiastic in building cities with dense regional planning and high population density.
Sublimity
Focusing on personal development and hating civilization that approaches oneself.
Placeholder
Placeholder that for filling extra slots if lack of cards
